title: Tli
description: Major burial ground of the late Bronze Age Koban culture, which flourished in the Caucasus from ca. 1400-400 BCE. The Tli necropolis, named after the nearby modern village of Tli, contains 481 graves dated from the Middle Bronze Age through the Iron Age.

properties.description: Point representing the village of Tli, derived from an OpenStreetMap Node.
properties.title: OSM location of modern Tli
